text: Rikon (no mōshiwatashi) wa, 2-do made yurusa reru. Sonogo wa kōheina taigū de dōkyo (fukuen) sa seru ka, aruiwa shinsetsu ni shite wakare nasai. Anata gata haka no on'na ni ataeta, nanimono mo torimodosu koto wa dekinai. Mottomo ryōnin ga, arrā no sadame rareta okite o mamori enai koto o osoreru baai wa betsudearu. Moshi anata gata ryōnin ga, arrā no sadame rareta okite o mamori enai koto o osorerunaraba, ka no on'na ga sono (jiyū o eru) tame ni tsugunai-kin o ataete mo, ryōnin tomo tsumi ni wa naranai. Kore wa arrā no okitedearu. Sore ko kore ni somuite wa naranai. Oyoso arrā no okite o okasu mono koso fugi no todearu
